product_name: Nutcase Little Nutty Bike Helmet - Kids'
long_description: With plenty of fun designs, the Nutcase Little Nutty bike helmet adds a bit of extra colorful flair to riding adventures. Features an injection-molded ABS shell over expanded polystyrene (EPS) protective inner foam for high-impact protection. 9 vents keep a kid's noggin cool; internal pads and chin strap pad offer extra comfort. Quick-release chin strap provides 1-handed operation; rear spin dial allows a custom fit around head. 1 size fits heads 18 - 20.5 in. (46 - 52cm).
short_description: With plenty of fun designs, the Nutcase Little Nutty bike helmet adds a bit of extra colorful flair to riding adventures.
